title: Victorian autograph commonplace book of Robert Johnson, Junior
creator: Johnson, Robert
description: A Victorian commonplace book (similar to a scrapbook), this one was written by a Robert Johnson, Junior, in 1846. Topics include a poem written about his brother's death, diary entries describing Ibrahim Pasha as well as a cricket match, fireworks, and performances. Several of the pages are written in shorthand.
subject: Ibrāhīm, Pasha, 1789-1848; Commonplace books; Great Britain -- History -- Victoria, 1837-1901 -- Biography; Autographs -- Great Britain; English literature -- 19th century.
extent: 99 unnumbered pages (11 pages written in shorthand) : illustrations ; 19 cm + 1 information sheet (29.5 x 21 cm)
source: From: Victorian autograph commonplace book of Robert Johnson, Junior
rights: This item is in the public domain.
repository: Rare Books and Special Collections Digital Library
